title: Introduction to C Programming
description: Master the fundamentals of C programming language and build a solid foundation in computer programming.

title: Introduction to C++ for DSA
description: Learn C++ programming, an industry-standard language, and unleash the power of object-oriented programming.

title: Basic Data Structures
description: Explore the world of data structures and gain insights into efficient data organization and manipulation.

title: Introduction to Algorithms
description: Dive deep into the world of algorithms and problem-solving techniques, essential for any programmer or computer scientist.

title: Introduction to OOP Python
description: Discover the power of object-oriented programming in Python and build scalable and maintainable applications.

title: Problem-Solving Part
description: Develop problem-solving skills with this course, tackling real-world challenges using algorithmic thinking.

title: Database (MySQL)
description: Master the art of database management, from designing schemas to optimizing queries, for efficient data handling.

title: AWS, Cloud Computing
description: Get hands-on experience with Amazon Web Services (AWS) and learn cloud computing essentials for modern applications.

title: Software Engineering
description: Learn the best practices of software engineering, from requirements analysis to software design and testing.
